entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
